mapper.insert: INSERT INTO special_break (specialId, empName, empBirth, empNo, position, department, startDate, endDate, useDays, type, reason, approval, status, specialType ) VALUES (#{specialId}, #{empName}, #{empBirth}, #{empNo}, #{position}, #{department}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{useDays}, #{type}, #{reason}, #{approval}, #{status}, #{specialType})
mapper.select: SELECT empId, empName, DATE_FORMAT(empBirth, '%Y-%m-%d') as empBirth, empNo, position, email, phoneNumber, emerNumber, bankName, accountNumber, department, DATE_FORMAT(hireDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as hireDate, status, role, totalDays FROM employee WHERE empNo = #{empNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by regDate) AS seq, specialType, empName, DATE_FORMAT(empBirth, '%Y-%m-%d') as empBirth, empNo, position, DATE_FORMAT(startDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as startDate, DATE_FORMAT(endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as endDate, useDays, type, reason, rejectReason, approval, regDate, specialType FROM special_break
mapper.select: ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}
